entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
